    level="1"

>
[Persistent Creation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1117) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Halcyon Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=30)

**Prerequisites**
[Halcyon Speaker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1115)

</column>

---

You can cast [_creation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=54) as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time. The created object lasts until you spend 1 hour not within its immediate vicinity or until it is destroyed. Such objects are called persistent creations. If you cast _creation_ again, any persistent creation you previously created with the spell immediately disintegrates.

<title level="2">Persistent Creation leads to...</title>
[Charged Creation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1120)
name: Persistent Creation
